title: tools/cmd/stringer: No documentation generated for the String method.
body:
The `stringer` command seems to generate just a single method in the form:

```
...
func (i Primitive) String() string {
...
```

Shouldn't it have _at least some_ generated documentation as well? For example:

```
...
// String returns a string representation for i.
func (i Primitive) String() string {
...
```
